gameWin.desc: To win: Get the highest score before losing all your lives.

arrows.desc: Use the left and right arrow key to move the ninja cat left and right.

chickenNugget.desc: Catch the chicken nuggets to score 50 points and gain a speed up power.

donut.desc: Catch the donuts to score 20 points, but each one slows you down (unless...)

fish.desc: Catch the fish to score 10 points.

hotPepper.desc: Avoid the hot peppers, they make you lose 75 points and instantly freeze you.

waterDrop.desc: Avoid the water drops, they cost a life. You have 9 lives.
